abstract.t: [I-D.ietf-dnsop-structured-dns-error] introduces structured error data for DNS responses that have been filtered. This draft suggests additions to that mechanism that enable applications to convey the details of some filtering incidents to their users. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/mnot/public-resolver-errors.
